data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Sidi Bel Abbès.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sidi Bel Abbès, Algeria

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Sidi Bel Abbès a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Sidi Bel Abbès, Algeria.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Sidi Bel Abbès to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Berber, Imazighen people might believe through him.
Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Sidi Bel Abbès.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Sidi Bel Abbès.
Lord, for the leaders in the state of Sidi Bel Abbès, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

location.name: Sidi Bel Abbès
